name: Supplier Selection App for Developers
description: Train and use Classification Model to predict whether a Supplier is Good or Bad

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Supply Chain Supplier Selection App

Overview

This app helps businesses streamline supplier evaluation by using data-driven classification models. It predicts whether a supplier is âGoodâ or âBadâ based on performance metrics, supporting strategic supplier selection and improved procurement planning.

Input

  • + Supplier data
  • + Model name

Output

  • + Exploratory Data Analysis with visual insights into supplier behavior
  • + Trained classification model to predict supplier quality
  • + Model validation results using cross-validation and accuracy metrics
  • + Validation insights comparing actual vs predicted classifications

Key Features

  • + Identify underperforming suppliers and improve supply chain reliability
  • + Enhance procurement decisions with predictive analytics
  • + Reduce operational risks by forecasting supplier behavior
  • + Support supplier negotiations and compliance tracking with evidence-backed analysis
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
Lead Time The time taken from order placement to delivery (In Days).
Order Fulfillment Time The time taken to process and fulfill an order (In Days).
Overall Cost The total cost involved in processing and delivering an order.
Order Cancellations The count of canceled orders.
Customer Rating Ratings given by customers.
Order Quantity The volume of items ordered.
Part Quality Score A score indicating the quality of parts or items ordered.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
